G3_build_succeeds.notes: npm run build completed successfully in 30s

A1_data_population.notes: Uses all 4 seeded projects correctly with valid schema.

A2_score_normalization.notes: Perfect implementation with clamping and rounding, separated into a pure utility.

A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Dedicated function handles boundary values correctly. Thresholds are hardcoded but clear.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Premium rendering with labeled and shaded background zones for each quadrant.

A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Shows Title, Quadrant, ROI, and scores. Well-styled with currency formatting.

A6_logic_ui_separation.notes: Excellent pipeline architecture separating parsing, validation, and transformation.

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: The Strategy Matrix is implemented with exceptional engineering quality, featuring a robust data pipeline and polished UI with background overlays.

B1_project_setup.notes: Professional setup with strict TS, path aliases, and comprehensive gitignore.

B2_routing_navigation.notes: Implements all PRD routes. Navigation is clear but lacks active state indicators.

B3_type_safety.notes: Exemplary use of Zod for schema enforcement and strict typing throughout.

B4_data_layer.notes: Production-quality data layer with centralized loaders and validation.

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: Solid technical foundation with strong emphasis on type safety and data integrity.

C1_visual_design.notes: Premium visual design, feels like a real SaaS product.

C2_responsive_design.notes: Fully responsive layout that works well across breakpoints.

C3_interactivity.notes: Smooth interactions and hover states, though missing complex micro-animations.

C4_empty_error_loading_states.notes: Excellent empty state with SVG and guidance, though missing PRD-required skeleton loaders.

C5_design_token_usage.notes: Hardcoded design token values from config.json instead of dynamic theming.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: High UI quality with great attention to spacing and layout, though some PRD polish requirements were missed.

D1_schema_adherence.notes: 100% adherence to PRD schema enforced by Zod.

D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.notes: Quadrant logic exactly matches PRD specifications including boundary conditions.

D3_route_structure.notes: All primary routes implemented as specified.

D4_specification_details.notes: Most details correct, but missed the cmd+k search shortcut requirement.

D_prd_compliance.category_commentary: Very high compliance with the PRD, showing careful reading of the specifications.

E1_separation_of_concerns.notes: Clean architectural separation between business logic and UI.

E2_readability_naming.notes: Naming is precise and domain-appropriate; code is self-documenting.

E3_error_handling.notes: Thoughtful error handling in the data pipeline, missing global error boundaries.

E4_dependency_choices.notes: Expert choices perfectly aligned with PRD recommendations.

E_code_quality.category_commentary: Exceptional code quality and architectural decisions.

F1_dashboard.notes: Complete executive dashboard with real computed metrics.

F2_additional_pages.notes: Significant extra work implementing Gantt chart and Project Library.

F3_search_filtering.notes: Functional fuzzy search and matrix filtering implemented.

F4_creative_additions.notes: Impressive implementation of the Gantt chart as a bonus feature.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: Demonstrated high velocity by shipping multiple complex bonus features.

G1_prioritization.notes: Strategic focus on both core requirements and high-impact bonus features.

G2_pr_description.notes: Exceptional documentation of process and decisions.

top_strengths: Exceptional Documentation and Process: The candidate maintained a very detailed journal, changelog, and phase-by-phase planning/review documents.
Robust Data Layer and Type Safety: Zod schema validation and strict TypeScript ensure high data integrity.
Comprehensive Feature Set: Delivered Matrix, Dashboard, Gantt Chart, and Project Library within the timebox.
top_weaknesses: Lack of Dynamic Theming: Design tokens were hardcoded into components rather than using a dynamic system.
Missing PRD Polish: Skeleton loaders and cmd+k search shortcut were not implemented.
standout_moments: Implementation of a custom Roadmap Gantt view and fuzzy search integration with Fuse.js.
Extremely detailed JOURNAL.md documenting every architectural decision and test result.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: Highly disciplined, senior-level developer with strong architectural thinking and exceptional documentation habits. A 'force multiplier' who builds robust, well-tested systems. Delivers high-quality code at significant velocity.
